endpoints.description: Retrieve the complete maintenance schedule for the facilities.
Submit a detailed report for any observed incidents or issues.
Retrieve summaries of predictive maintenance algorithms and findings.
Upload new data collected from sensors for analysis.
Get the probability of potential failures in the system components.
Update an existing maintenance schedule entry by ID.
Remove a specific incident report by ID.
Retrieve the current status and performance metrics of equipment.
Access active alerts and warnings related to system performance.
Execute a custom analytics query on existing datasets.
